item.description: Just a quick note without a title. This is how microblog-style posts appear in the theme.

item.title: Hello World
item.description:
This is a sample post with a title. It demonstrates how the theme renders titled articles with the full header including the post name and date.

Here’s some example content with bold and italic text.

This is a blockquote to test the accent styling.

And some inline code for good measure.

item.title: About
item.description: This is a sample about page to test the static page layout.
